title: #454 Do Better: An Unattainable New Years Resolution Podcast with Sarah Tollemache
itunes:title: Do Better: An Unattainable New Years Resolution Podcast with Sarah Tollemache
description:
Sarah Tollemache and ever-fatter former non-steroid winner of Sober October Ari Shaffir sit on a treadmill in a gym they’ll never use to go over ways they’re going to no way change about themselves this year. Sarah is on the phone like 160 hours a day. And I haven't come up with a decent new resolution in a decade. They’re two losers who are fine with it, shooting the poop about what you guys need to do better in the coming year. This one is best listened to in a church confessional booth.

The Three Degrees - Year of Decision

Ok Go - Here it goes again

Skid Row - 18 and Life

 

Thank you to our sponsors! Go to BetterHelp.com/Ari for 10% off your first month of counseling, and head to 3chi.com and use NEW promo code "Ari" for 5% off your order!
